question: The headquarters of Organisation of Islamic Cooperation (OIC) is located in which city?
explanation:
The Organisation of Islamic Cooperation (OIC) is an international organisation comprising of 57 member nations, with 53 Muslim-majority countries. The headquarters of OIC is located in the city of Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.
The organisation was recently in news, as it had recently urged India to take immediate steps to protect the rights of minority Muslim community in India, who are being stigmatized. It also asked the Indian government to intervene and prevent the incidents of hatred expressed towards Muslims.
